channel.title: Border Patrol on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Border Patrol on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-54 North - Inspection Station
item.description: Approaching Border Patrol Inspection Station on US-54 north. All roads leading out of the El Paso area have Border Patrol Inspections that you must pass through.

item.title: US-54 North - New Mexico Weigh Station
item.description: Approaching New Mexico Weigh Station and Border Patrol Checkpoint.
